name: League leaderboard
body:
League Leaderboard is a simple stats table android app for League of Legends. Users can see where they stand compared to their friends in a variety of stats and queue types.

### Features
- Sort-able by Wins/Kills/Assists/CS/Neutral Monsters/Turrests
- Supports unranked and ranked solo/duo queue
- Filter Ranked stats by previous N games or within date range
- Every stat (nearly 50 of them) for Ranked games

### Screenshots
![Portrait View](http://i.imgur.com/rfdYqxW.png)

![Landscape View](http://i.imgur.com/Bm3xKbm.png)

### Upcoming Features
- Filter Ranked stats based on role played
- ARAM and Ranked Team stats
